segments.text: Yes , ma'ma . May I help you with your bags ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , if you like.The large one goes to Washington.The other one I will take with me . All right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Flight 36 to Washington.It ' ll be on the plane for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , thank you . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2
